code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:pt presents with progressive mild urinary urgency and weak stream for past 2 weeks. pt is a 62 year old white m. Patient does not smoke he denies drinking alcohol o:Height 181 cm, Weight 104.1 kg, Temperature 37.3 C, Pulse 78, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 71, Respiration 16 a:Prostate Cancer p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed bicalutamide - 50 mg daily, and ordered PSA, PSA velocity.
